text:
Look at him go! Theo Wargo/Getty Images

Harry Styles performed two songs during the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show.

His funky dance moves really stood out.

People on Twitter seemed to love them more than the runway show itself.

Harry Styles performed two songs during the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show— and his quirky dance moves stole all the attention away from the models.

During the show — which was held in Shanghai, China, and televised on CBS Tuesday night — Styles clearly enjoyed himself while he sang the songs "Kiwi" and "Only Angel" from his recent self-titled album.

He played "Kiwi" first. Theo Wargo/Getty Images

Styles sang "Only Angel" during the show's finale. Theo Wargo/Getty Images

He got seriously into it. Frazer Harrison/Getty Images

If these pictures aren't doing it for you, watch his dancing for yourself.

It's easy to see why Styles' fans were enamored by his dancing.

title: Harry Styles had the time of his life dancing during the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show — and people loved it
